LanguageData.Warg.label: warg
LanguageData.Warg.description: Heavily-muscled wolf-like creatures. Scientists say wargs are the descendants of weaponized military animals created for population suppression. The superstitious see them as the tools of an angry god.
LanguageData.Warg_Leather.label: warg leather
LanguageData.Warg_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a warg.
LanguageData.Warg_Meat.label: warg meat
LanguageData.Warg_Corpse.label: warg corpse
LanguageData.Muffalo.label: muffalo
LanguageData.Muffalo.description: A large herding herbivore descended from buffalo and adapted for some exotic environment. Peaceful unless disturbed.
LanguageData.Muffalo_Leather.label: muffalo leather
LanguageData.Muffalo_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a muffalo.
LanguageData.Muffalo_Meat.label: muffalo meat
LanguageData.Muffalo_Corpse.label: muffalo corpse
LanguageData.Deer.label: deer
LanguageData.Deer.description: A medium-sized herding herbivore. Generally peaceful unless disturbed.
LanguageData.Deer_Leather.label: deer leather
LanguageData.Deer_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a deer.
LanguageData.Deer_Meat.label: deer meat
LanguageData.Deer_Corpse.label: deer corpse
LanguageData.Squirrel.label: squirrel
LanguageData.Squirrel.description: One of the many hardy, versatile rodent species that follows humankind everywhere it spreads.
LanguageData.Squirrel_Leather.label: squirrel leather
LanguageData.Squirrel_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a squirrel.
LanguageData.Squirrel_Meat.label: squirrel meat
LanguageData.Squirrel_Corpse.label: squirrel corpse
LanguageData.Elk.label: elk
LanguageData.Elk.description: A large member of the deer family, well-adapted to life in cold climates.
LanguageData.Elk_Leather.label: elk leather
LanguageData.Elk_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of an elk.
LanguageData.Elk_Meat.label: elk meat
LanguageData.Elk_Corpse.label: elk corpse
LanguageData.Alphabeaver.label: alphabeaver
LanguageData.Alphabeaver.description: A large beaver derivative genetically engineered to harvest wood with machine-like efficiency. In the absence of specialized feed, these animals will enter a manic state that compels them to eat trees whole.
LanguageData.Alphabeaver_Leather.label: alphabeaver leather
LanguageData.Alphabeaver_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of an alphabeaver.
LanguageData.Alphabeaver_Meat.label: alphabeaver meat
LanguageData.Alphabeaver_Corpse.label: alphabeaver corpse
LanguageData.WildBoar.label: wild boar
LanguageData.WildBoar.description: Although considered impure by some cultures, this hairy ancestor of the domesticated pig is prized for the gamey flavor of its meat.
LanguageData.WildBoar_Leather.label: wild boar leather
LanguageData.WildBoar_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a wild boar.
LanguageData.WildBoar_Meat.label: wild boar meat
LanguageData.WildBoar_Meat.description: Raw flesh of a wild boar.
LanguageData.WildBoar_Corpse.label: wild boar corpse
LanguageData.WildBoar_Corpse.description: Dead body of a wild boar.
LanguageData.Rhinoceros.label: rhinoceros
LanguageData.Rhinoceros.description: This large land mammal is typically quite peaceful, but it will not hesitate to charge with its horn to fend off trespassers.
LanguageData.Rhinoceros_Leather.label: rhinoceros leather
LanguageData.Rhinoceros_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a rhinoceros.
LanguageData.Rhinoceros_Meat.label: rhinoceros meat
LanguageData.Rhinoceros_Corpse.label: rhinoceros corpse
LanguageData.Dromedary.label: dromedary
LanguageData.Dromedary.description: Adapted to survival in arid environments, this distant cousin of the horse can go weeks without water.
LanguageData.Dromedary_Leather.label: dromedary leather
LanguageData.Dromedary_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a dromedary.
LanguageData.Dromedary_Meat.label: dromedary meat
LanguageData.Dromedary_Corpse.label: dromedary corpse
LanguageData.Boomrat.label: boomrat
LanguageData.Boomrat.description: Either by deliberate genetic weaponization, or as an unusual defense mechanism, these rodent-like creatures create a powerful fire-starting explosion when killed.
LanguageData.Boomrat_Leather.label: boomrat leather
LanguageData.Boomrat_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a boomrat.
LanguageData.Boomrat_Meat.label: boomrat meat
LanguageData.Boomrat_Corpse.label: boomrat corpse
LanguageData.Hare.label: hare
LanguageData.Hare.description: This small, solitary herbivore can swiftly hop away from danger.
LanguageData.Hare_Leather.label: hare leather
LanguageData.Hare_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a hare.
LanguageData.Hare_Meat.label: hare meat
LanguageData.Hare_Corpse.label: hare corpse
LanguageData.Iguana.label: iguana
LanguageData.Iguana.description: These large lizards normally feed on plant matter. However, when angered, their tough hide and sharp claws make them quite dangerous.
LanguageData.Iguana_Leather.label: iguana leather
LanguageData.Iguana_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of an iguana.
LanguageData.Iguana_Meat.label: iguana meat
LanguageData.Iguana_Corpse.label: iguana corpse
LanguageData.Megascarab.label: megascarab
LanguageData.Megascarab.description: A large, genetically-engineered beetle. Once the worker caste of an artifical ecosystem of insectoids designed to fight mechanoid invasions, it is now usually seen without its deadlier insectoid cousins. Still, its size and hard shell make it dangerous when it attacks.
LanguageData.Megascarab_Meat.label: megascarab meat
LanguageData.Megascarab_Corpse.label: megascarab corpse
LanguageData.Tortoise.label: tortoise
LanguageData.Tortoise.description: This heavily armored land-dwelling reptile is known for its slow moving speed and surprisingly vicious bite.
LanguageData.Tortoise_Leather.label: tortoise leather
LanguageData.Tortoise_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a tortoise.
LanguageData.Tortoise_Meat.label: tortoise meat
LanguageData.Tortoise_Corpse.label: tortoise corpse
LanguageData.Cobra.label: cobra
LanguageData.Cobra.description: A large snake. Cobras can be highly aggressive if provoked - it's better to stay away from these creatures.
LanguageData.Cobra_Leather.label: cobra leather
LanguageData.Cobra_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a cobra.
LanguageData.Cobra_Meat.label: cobra meat
LanguageData.Cobra_Corpse.label: cobra corpse
LanguageData.Monkey.label: monkey
LanguageData.Monkey.description: This monkey can use its curly tail to grab on to branches, leaving its hands free to do other things.
LanguageData.Monkey_Leather.label: monkey leather
LanguageData.Monkey_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a monkey.
LanguageData.Monkey_Meat.label: monkey meat
LanguageData.Monkey_Corpse.label: monkey corpse
